themes: uncertainty about funding eligibility and continuity
need for increased facility and venue support
financial strain of venue upkeep and overhead
inaccessibility of art due to high ticket prices
importance of art and community in funding decisions
key_phrases: We need Thrive level funding (or beyond)
very uncertain whether we'll be eligible for more of that funding without a gap
As we run a venue, that would be devastating for us
more focus on the importance of the art and the communities we serve in the funding process
We desperately need facility and venue support
The financial drain of upkeep and overhead is so real
art makers can't charge a ticket price that would support that without making the art completely unaccessible to large pockets of our communities
barriers_identified: lack of facility and venue support
financial drain of upkeep and overhead
inability to set ticket prices that cover costs without excluding community members
solutions_proposed: more focus on the importance of the art and the communities we serve in the funding process
